articles.title: Walmart to end cigarette sales in select stores, markets - Fox Business
articles.description: Walmart will end cigarette sales at select U.S. store locations, the company said Monday. The retailer, which has approximately 4,700 total stores in the country, did not disclose how many locations would be affected.
